languages.text: "Мне нужно время, чтобы как следует обдумать случившееся и свою роль в нем. Думаю, я буду готов продолжить этот разговор позже, когда мы вернемся на корабль". {n}Абеляр почтительно кланяется вам и задумчиво отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мне нужно время, чтобы как следует обдумать случившееся и свою роль в нем. Думаю, я буду готов продолжить этот разговор позже, когда мы вернемся на корабль. Пока же, прошу вас, отдохните. Вы ведь в своем замке и можете позволить себе эту роскошь".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мне нужно время, чтобы как следует обдумать случившееся и свою роль в нем. Думаю, я буду готов продолжить этот разговор позже, когда мы вернемся на корабль". {n}Абеляр почтительно кланяется вам и задумчиво отворачивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon the event and the role I have had in it. I think I will be ready to continue this conversation later, when we are back on the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you reverently and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon the event and the role I have had in it. I think I will be ready to continue this conversation later, when we are back on the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you reverently and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I had in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you reverently and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I had in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you reverently and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「起きたこと、そして我が為した役割について熟考する時間が必要です。後ほど、船に戻ってから話し直すということでよろしいでしょうか」{n}アベラルドは恭しく頭を下げると、背を向けて考え込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「起きたこと、そして我が為した役割について熟考する時間が必要です。後ほど、船に戻ってから話し直すということでよろしいでしょうか」{n}アベラルドは恭しく頭を下げると、背を向けて考え込む。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我需要一些时间来理清最近发生的一切，想想我到底在其中扮演了怎样的角色。等回到飞船上后，我再和您继续今天的谈话。”{n}说罢，阿贝拉德恭敬地鞠了一躬，然后转过身，陷入了沉思。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我需要一些时间来理清最近发生的一切，想想我到底在其中扮演了怎样的角色。等回到飞船上后，我再和您继续今天的谈话。”{n}说罢，阿贝拉德恭敬地鞠了一躬，然后转过身，陷入了沉思。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai besoin de temps pour réfléchir à ce qui vient de se passer et au rôle que j'ai joué dans cet incident. Nous pourrons en rediscuter plus tard, une fois de retour sur le vaisseau. » {n}Abélard s'incline respectueusement et se détourne, l'air perdu dans ses pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai besoin de temps pour réfléchir à ce qui vient de se passer et au rôle que j'ai joué dans cet incident. Nous pourrons en rediscuter plus tard, une fois de retour sur le vaisseau. » {n}Abélard s'incline respectueusement et se détourne, l'air perdu dans ses pensées.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Necesito tiempo para reflexionar sobre lo sucedido y sobre mi papel en ello. Creo que podré hablar de ello más tarde, una vez volvamos a la nave». {n}Abelard hace una reverencia y se da la vuelta ensimismado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Necesito tiempo para reflexionar sobre lo sucedido y sobre mi papel. Creo que podré hablar de ello más tarde, una vez volvamos a la nave». {n}Abelard hace una reverencia y se da la vuelta ensimismado.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss über das Geschehene und meine Rolle dabei nachdenken. Ich denke, ich werde später bereit sein, diese Unterhaltung fortzuführen. Wenn wir wieder an Bord des Schiffs sind." {n}Abelard verneigt sich ehrfürchtig vor dir und wendet sich gedankenverloren ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss über das Geschehene und meine Rolle dabei nachdenken. Ich denke, ich werde später bereit sein, diese Unterhaltung fortzuführen. Wenn wir wieder an Bord des Schiffs sind." {n}Abelard verneigt sich ehrfürchtig vor dir und wendet sich gedankenverloren ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Son olaylarla ve yaptıklarımla ilgili biraz düşünmem lazım. Dilerseniz gemiye çıktığımızda tekrar konuşalım." {n}Abelard, saygıyla eğilip düşüncelere dalmış bir hâlde uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I need time to reflect upon what happened and the role I played in it. I think I will be ready to resume this conversation later, when we are back on board the ship." {n}Abelard bows to you deferentially and turns away, lost in thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Son olaylarla ve yaptıklarımla ilgili biraz düşünmem lazım. Dilerseniz gemiye çıktığımızda tekrar konuşalım." {n}Abelard saygıyla eğilip düşüncelere dalmış bir hâlde ayrılıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
